website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty elbow sleeve that delivers effective compression. Sizing can be a bit hit and miss, but fantastic customer service is always on hand to address issues.
pros: Offers good levels of compression for improved circulation, reduced swelling, and supportive pain relief
Materials naturally retain body heat, providing soothing warmth
Anti-slip design doesn't easily roll or bunch
Boasts a quality construction that's sturdy and durable
cons: It's a bit thick and may be uncomfortable in warm weather

customer_reviews.title: BEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have never written a review before but Venom Sports and their customer service compelled me to write one. I ordered a Large and it was not tight enough (order one size smaller than measured) and I contact Venom to exchange the product. They replied immediately and they did not have a Medium in stock and told me to keep my Large and they would send me the Medium free once it was back in stock. Sure enough 2 weeks later as described they sent me the other brace free. Fits great, feels great and I cannot state how amazing the customer service is with this company.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sports elbow brace/sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: Venom nor Amazon in no way influenced nor offered me any compensation or incentives whatsoever! Just received this awesome, well made elbow brace/sleeve. Nothing like the old, geriatric looking elbow braces from the 80s, 90s and early 2000s. Only problem was that a I ordered the wrong size due to the fact that instead of using a "Tailoring measuring tape"(which I do not own), I used a "Kobalt" regular retractable measuring tape (foolish me, I tried to be "Mcguyver"). Anyway, I can tell and assume that this sleeve/brace is going to be amazing in reducing my tendinitis during my gym workouts! Thank you Amazon, and thank you Venom sports/Fitness for having this product.
customer_reviews.author: Winning777

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit and good quality
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very happy with my purchase. Comfortable and seems to help alleviate pain. I was on in the middle of the large and extra large measurement and went with the extra large which seems like the right choice as long as they don't stretch out. They feel fresh and not itchy or hot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob T

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this to play tennis once or twice a week. Working great so far nice comfy grip overall. Just remember this is compression so order one size if you use it for tennis otherwise it will be little tight and this is just my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous little remedy!
customer_reviews.text: I've had tendonitis in my elbow for over a year now and I always look for different remedies for my injury ans I happen to come across this Venom brace. It was really cheap so I did not feel bad for buying it. .To my amazement, the brace did a good job of decreasing the pain. I am strongly considering buying another one while the price is still so low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! does exactly what it states here. Keeps compression on my tendonitis so I can get through my physical work all day. Ships fast, great people at customer service and awesome product. What more do you want?
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good compression without cutting off flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for close to a week now and its doing its job. Pretty good compression without cutting off flexibility. The material feels high quality. Hopefully it keeps its elasticity as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: A. Javidfar

customer_reviews.title: supportive but constrictive
customer_reviews.text: I have golpher's elbow, don't play golf though, my elbows are very tender and causing pain into my hands, hard to do anything. These help as far as support but as they are so tight my hands swell and cause more pain. I haven't found anything that will keep my arms straight at night to stop the pain in my hands and elbows.
customer_reviews.author: vmessersmith

customer_reviews.title: Good sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The sleeve gives very good support, But since I have large bicep and tricep muscles, the top does roll down a little when I become active.
customer_reviews.author: ELBERT WHITFIELD

customer_reviews.title: Venom is a great company!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My wife purchased them on help with tendinitis in both elbows. Immediately after putting them on, my elbows felt better. They are extremely comfortable and breathable. Even when using the sizing chart, I felt the compression could be tighter. I contacted the company and they honored their replacement policy immediately. I received a new pair within a few days. I will be ordering some of their knee braces soon. Thank you Venom for such a great brace!
customer_reviews.author: CARL E LYNCH JR

customer_reviews.title: Too tight.
customer_reviews.text: I am 5.8 and 160lb. My measurement was 12.5. Just in case, I ordered XL. But it is still too tight. It really hurts my biceps and leaves visible round marks below and above the elbow. Compression is good, and it helps a little, but since I cannot wear it for more than just few minutes I am planning to order some other elbow brace.
customer_reviews.author: Garik Syhoi

customer_reviews.title: What I Was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: Have had some elbow discomfort lately, ordered an XL and while being a bit too tight it definitely reduced the discomfort at the gym. Some movements still bring some pain but this has helped. I contacted the company about the tightness of the XL and they immediately sent me an XXL and the fit is more comfortable. This is the type of customer service that along with an excellent product will get my future business. A+
customer_reviews.author: J. Benvignati

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement after just two weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Two weeks ago I was in a ton of pain with bad tendinitis in my elbow. I seemed to have tennis elbow and golfers elbow as the same time even though I haven't played either for years! It was getting worse every day and had gotten almost unbearable. After two weeks of wearing this thing I feel 80% better despite using my arm all the time. I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Huw Peterson

customer_reviews.title: It works. The company stands behind it 100%.
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue with the first shipment, contacted them and they IMMEDIATELY sent one that fits properly. Customer service is great. Now, the product has given me almost instant relief to most of my movements. It seriously has helped. I'm very pleased with both product and the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Stellar Customer Service and High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I first ordered a small, but found that it was the wrong size, so I contacted Venom. They responded within 24 hours and immediately shipped a medium elbow brace without charge. A free guide on physical therapy for climber's/golfer's elbow was also provided, and overall customer service was incredible. The sleeve itself is also very high quality (as far as I can tell). I love the way it looks and the compression it provides has helped make my workouts a lot less painful. Highly recommend this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered the wrong size sleeve and the company exchanged in record time. The new sleeve fits great and provides the support I need for my elbow. Impeccable customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Robin R

customer_reviews.title: Works well and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked as I expected and helps when playing tennis and at the gym. Wish there was some better support at the top to keep it from rolling down. Had a question about size and they sent another without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: RobA

customer_reviews.title: No significant effect
customer_reviews.text: Used product for tennis elbow. It keeps my arm warm, but can't say that it has affected my recovery.
customer_reviews.author: T. Isseks

customer_reviews.title: sizing chart is way off. Per the chart I ...
customer_reviews.text: sizing chart is way off. Per the chart I was a medium (as a woman). My husband who wears large shirts is a medium and feels the medium is loose for him. Will rerate when I get an extra small.
customer_reviews.author: BRZ

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't stay on my arm it roll down all the time
customer_reviews.author: Armstrong

product_meta.title: Venom Elbow Brace Compression Sleeve - Elastic Support, Tendonitis Pain, Tennis Elbow, Golfer's Elbow, Arthritis, Bursitis, Basketball, Baseball, Football, Golf, Lifting, Sports
feature_bullets: TARGETED COMPRESSION AND HEAT RETENTION: Designed for rehabilitation of joint inflammation, elbow tendonitis, tennis elbow, golfer's elbow, arthritis and general elbow pain. Our compressive sleeve will increase blood flow, reduce muscle swelling, and alleviate pain and discomfort.

COMFORTABLE LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Not only will your pain be reduced, but our sleeve will eliminate bunching and irritation so your movement will be unrestricted during physical and every day activities. Perfect solution for tennis, golf, volleyball, football, basketball, softball, baseball, CrossFit, weightlifting and many other athletic activities.
ANTI-SLIP DESIGN: The firm yet flexible grip allows you to focus on the activity rather than worrying about constant readjustment.
HIGHLY ELASTIC AND DURABLE: Our high quality fabric is guaranteed to withstand the wear and tear of every day usage by retaining its elasticity and support.

SIZING OPTIONS: Available in sizes S, M, L, XL and XXL for a secured fit. Please refer to our size chart shown in the pictures in order to determine accurate sizing. As a bonus, you will receive a complimentary PDF guide with various recovery exercises for your elbow.
